The rock golem can be found in the Enchanted Valley, accessible using the fairy ring code BKQ, appearing when attempting to mine a rock. The rock golem will use Ranged attacks and Protect from Missiles will negate all damage.

Before the random event update in 2014, the rock golem used to appear randomly when Mining. Upon appearing, it would say Raarrrgghh! Flee human! As with similar guardian random events, the rock golem's combat level and stats scaled with the player's combat level, as well as only being attackable by the targeted player.

Levels[edit | edit source]

The rock golem's combat level when it appears is dependent on the player's own combat level.

Player combat level Rock golem level
3-10 14
11-20 29
21-40 49
41-60 79
61-90 120
90+ 159

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 April 2021
(update)

The Rock golem was made into a golem.

29 March 2004
(update)

The NPC was permanently added with the launch of RuneScape 2.

2 February 2004
(update)

The NPC was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.
